markdown.markdown:
### For students #### Broad Undergraduate Teaching Assistanceships - Opportunities vary per university, but check with your department and work-study websites for information. Sometimes these opportunities aren't advised well- if you have a class where you would like to do this, it doesn't hurt to ask the instructor about opportunities! - Here is an example program: [University of Texas College of Natural Sciences](https://cns.utexas.edu/tides/faculty/ugta-resources/students) [NSF Research Experiences for Undergraduates](https://www.nsf.gov/crssprgm/reu/)\ [American Physiology Society Undergraduate Summer Research Fellowship](https://www.physiology.org/ugsrf?SSO=Y) - \$4,000 stipend, up to \$1,300 in EB travel expenses and a one year complimentary APS membership. 10 week position. [Society of Wetland Scientists Student Research Grant](http://www.sws.org/Awards-and-Grants/student-research-grants.html)\ [Bat Conservation International Student Research Scholarship](http://www.batcon.org/our-work/initiatives/award-grants-scholarships) - Opens in October [Garden Club of America Scholarships](https://www.gcamerica.org/scholarships) - There are a variety of scholarships available - Subject list: Botany, Coastal Wetland Studies, Conservation & Ecological Restoration, Desert Studies, Garden History & Design, Horticulture & Related Fields, International Work & Study, Landscape Architecture, Native Bird Habitat, Pollinator Research, Summer Environmental Study, Urban Forestry [National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration Ernest F. Hollings Undergraduate Scholarship](https://www.noaa.gov/office-education/hollings-scholarship) - Includes academic assistance (up to \$9500 per year) for two years and a 10-week paid summer internship (\$700 per week) [Sigma Xi Grants in Aid of Research](https://www.sigmaxi.org/programs/grants-in-aid) [Human-Environment Regional Observatory Fellowship](https://www.clarku.edu/departments/hero-program/) - Eight week stipend and academic credit #### Local [Hudson River Foundation Polgar Fellowship](https://www.hudsonriver.org/grants#polgar-fellowship) - \$5000 summertime grant in New York and New Jersey area ### For faculty [NSF Facilitating Research at Primarily Undergraduate Universities](https://www.nsf.gov/funding/pgm_summ.jsp?pims_id=5518&org=NSF) R01 supplements for URM students are available:\

If you are an URM student and your mentor has an active R01, they could apply for a diversity supplement to cover your stipend, tuition, and up to 4K in institutional allowance. I also have a diversity supplement application to share. DM if interested.

--- Anny Reyes, MS (@annyreyesNeuro) June 10, 2020
